mapper.update: update comments set comment_content=#{comment_content} where post_no=#{post_no} and user_ID={#user_ID} and comment_no=#{comment_no}
mapper.select: select * from comments where post_no = #{post_no} order by comment_time
select c.comment_no, c.post_no, c.user_id, c.comment_content, c.comment_time, u.user_fname from comments c, users u where post_no=#{post_no} and c.user_id=u.user_id order by comment_time
select count(*) from comments where post_no=#{post_no}
mapper.delete: delete comments where post_no in (select post_no from post where post_deltime <= sysdate)
